author: marrs
msg: Added a 'stats' option to the 'dm' command that shows the total amount of components and dependencies.
Implemented the shell without having to rely on ComponentDeclaration services.

author: marrs
msg: Added an @author tag to all class comments.
Fixed a couple of missing license headers.
Implemented InvocationUtil to use a LRU method cache.
Reformatted and removed some dead code.

author: gnodet
msg: [KARAF-585] When connected to a remote instance, Ctrl-C closes the connection instead of simply interrupting the command

author: gnodet
msg: [KARAF-585] When connected to a remote instance, Ctrl-C closes the connection instead of simply interrupting the command
